pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### BRIL Work Suitepython package for working with BRIL data #### Install#### into brilconda virtual environmentpip install brilwspip uninstall brilws#### into local user areaexport PYTHONPATH=$HOME/.local:$PYTHONPATHpip install --install-option="--prefix=$HOME/.local" brilwspip uninstall brilws### Examples### Build & Distributepython setup.py sdist python setup.py register -r pypipython setup.py sdist upload -r pypi
